attributes.action: ban Islam4UK and for Anjem Choudery to be tried for blatent treason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Islam4UK is an extremist group which has no place in the United Kingdom. The public want this group banned. Anjem Choudery is making a mockery of the United Kindom. Anjem Choudery has admitted treason on live television! He must face treason charges! Islam4UK must be banned immediately!

rejection.details: The group has now been banned.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
